## 2024-05-22 - Visual Typing in Text Interfaces
**Learning:** Even in text-only interfaces (like Markdown files generated by AI), visual cues like emojis can significantly improve scanability without breaking downstream parsers, provided the parsers rely on LLMs or flexible regex.
**Action:** Look for other opportunities to add "semantic icons" to generated text outputs (e.g., test results, status updates) to improve DX.
